abstract: Patrick Reese, aide to Pennsylvania Atty Gen Kathleen Kane, is sentenced to three to six months in prison for illegally accessing emails about grand jury investigation of Kane.
lead_paragraph: An aide to the embattled Attorney General Kathleen Kane of Pennsylvania was sentenced to jail Thursday for illegally accessing emails to keep tabs on a grand jury investigation of Ms. Kane.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Aide to Kane Jailed for Violating Court Order
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Aide to Kane Jailed for Violating Court Order

snippet: An aide to the embattled Attorney General Kathleen Kane of Pennsylvania was sentenced to jail Thursday for illegally accessing emails to keep tabs on a grand jury investigation of Ms. Kane.
